text: This is a great beer to enjoy in a sunny day!

The beer, the myth... the legend. It was of course a divine experience to taste it the first time. However, it’s a beer that you’ll gladly revisit at any chance given. A refreshing and amazing good old West Coast IPA, full of hoppy excitement!
Stone Enjoy By 4-20-21, on tap in Ernie´s Tin Bar, Petaluma, in October. An excellent double IPA, brimming with luscious and fresh hop aromas and flavours, intense but not too extreme.
